column2: HP Spectre x360 Convertible laptop; Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7500U CPU @ 2.70GHz, 2904 Mhz, 2 Cores, 4 Logical Processors; 16 GB RAM
Custom Perl and Python scripts using these external tools: pod2man, pod2text, pod2html, perldoc, pod2pdf, perltidy, pygmentize
Perl v5.8 or higher; DBI, DBD-mysql, DBD-Oracle, DBD-Pg to use database scripts; Python 2.7, Python 3.7, or higher; RDKit to use RDKit scripts
